channel.title: Someone help me with 2 things
channel.description:
ok 1 thing is: How do i make someone a mod or admin
2 is: How do i let other ppl on my server
p.s i have svenscape3pk[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 08:42:55 AM[/size][hr]help me and you get to be admin and or co-owner

item.title: Someone help me with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

Okay.

  1. Open your client.java file. Then search (Ctrl+F) for moderator. Keep clicking next until you find “Start of Admin/Moderator list” or something like that. You find something like:
    Player.ignoreCase “(Some Name Here)”{
    playerRights = 1/2/3
    }
    For player rights, it’s either 1, 2, 3.
    1 = Mod
    2 = Admin
    3 = Owner/Co-owner

You replace (Some Name Here) with the username you want to upgrade their rank.

  1. Follow Mod Tarohk’s (spelling?) Tut

Read full topic
